TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Route extends System.Web.Routing.RouteBase

summary.span: 提供用於定義路由及取得路由相關資訊的屬性和方法。

span.span: Provides properties and methods for defining a route and for obtaining information about the route.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可讓您指定在 ASP.NET 應用程式中的路由處理方式。The class enables you to specify how routing is processed in an ASP.NET application. 您建立物件的每個您想要對應至類別，可處理的 URL 模式要求對應到該模式。You create a object for each URL pattern that you want to map to a class that can handle requests that correspond to that pattern. 然後您加入的路由集合。You then add the route to the collection. 當應用程式收到要求時，ASP.NET 路由逐一中路由来尋找符合 URL 模式的第一個路由集合。When the application receives a request, ASP.NET routing iterates through the routes in the collection to find the first route that matches the pattern of the URL. 設定URL 模式的屬性。Set the property to a URL pattern. HTTP 要求中的應用程式名稱的後面的區段所組成的 URL 模式。The URL pattern consists of segments that come after the application name in an HTTP request. 例如，在 URL 中`http://www.contoso.com/products/show/beverages`，模式適用於`products/show/beverages`。For example, in the URL `http://www.contoso.com/products/show/beverages`, the pattern applies to `products/show/beverages`. 使用三個模式區段，例如`{controller}/{action}/{id}`，符合 URL `http://www.contoso.com/products/show/beverages`。A pattern with three segments, such as `{controller}/{action}/{id}`, matches the URL `http://www.contoso.com/products/show/beverages`. 每個區段分隔`/`字元。Each segment is delimited by the `/` character. 當一個區段是大括弧括住 (`{`和`}`)，區段指 URL 參數。When a segment is enclosed in braces (`{` and `}`), the segment is referred to a URL parameter. ASP.NET 路由要求中擷取值，並將它指派給 URL 參數。ASP.NET routing retrieves the value from the request and assigns it to the URL parameter. 在上述範例中，URL 參數`action`被指派的值`show`。In the previous example, the URL parameter `action` is assigned the value `show`. 如果區段不括在大括弧，值會視為常值中。If the segment is not enclosed in braces, the value is treated as a literal value. 設定屬性物件，其中包含遺漏某參數從 URL，或在 URL 中設定額外的值為尚未參數化時，所使用的值。Set the property to a object that includes values that are used if a parameter is missing from the URL or to set additional values that are not parameterized in the URL. 設定屬性物件，其中包含可能是規則運算式的值或物件。Set the property to a object that contains values that are either regular expressions or objects. 這些值可用來判斷參數值是否有效。These values are used to determine whether a parameter value is valid. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立物件，並將它加入至屬性。The following example shows how to create a object and add it to the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes/vb/Global.asax#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定運算式的字典，這些運算式指定 URL 參數的有效值。

span.span: Gets or sets a dictionary of expressions that specify valid values for a URL parameter.

value.span: 物件，包含參數名稱和運算式。

span.span: An object that contains the parameter names and expressions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您限制處理的路由 URL 參數的可接受的值。The property enables you to limit acceptable values for a URL parameter that is processed by a route. 您指派物件屬性。You assign a object to the property. 在每個項目物件包含的參數和下列其中一種名稱：Each element in the object contains the name of a parameter and one of the following: - 定義規則運算式的字串。A string that defines a regular expression. 規則運算式不區分大小寫。The regular expression is case-insensitive. - 物件，用於實作介面，包括方法。An object that implements the interface and that includes a method. 類別會實作 介面。The class implements the interface. 您可以包含的執行個體作為以指定哪些 HTTP 動詞命令是可接受的路由條件約束的類別。You can include an instance of the class as a constraint to specify which HTTP verbs are acceptable for the route. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立物件，並設定， ，和屬性。The following example shows how to create a object and set the , , and properties. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Routing.Route.ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.Route.ctor/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Routing.Route.ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.Route.ctor/VB/Global.asax#1)] 下列範例所示物件，其屬性包含名為`httpMethod`與執行個體類別值。The following example shows a object whose property contains a parameter named `httpMethod` with an instance of the class for the value. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Routing.Route.Constraints#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.Route.Constraints/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Routing.Route.Constraints#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.Route.Constraints/vb/Global.asax#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定自訂值，這些自訂值會傳遞給路由處理常式，但不會用來判斷路由是否符合 URL 模式。

span.span: Gets or sets custom values that are passed to the route handler, but which are not used to determine whether the route matches a URL pattern.
An object that contains custom values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用屬性來擷取，或指派與路由相關聯的值不會用來判斷路由是否符合 URL 模式。You use the property to retrieve or assign values associated with the route that are not used to determine whether a route matches a URL pattern. 這些值會傳遞至路由處理常式，以用來處理要求。These values are passed to the route handler, where they can be used for processing the request. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立物件，並設定， ，和屬性。The following example shows how to create a object and set the , , and properties. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Routing.Route.ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.Route.ctor/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Routing.Route.ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.Route.ctor/VB/Global.asax#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 URL 未包含所有參數時所要使用的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the values to use if the URL does not contain all the parameters.

value.span: 物件，包含參數名稱和預設值。

span.span: An object that contains the parameter names and default values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您設定 URL 參數的值，如果 URL 不包含該參數的區段。The property enables you to set the value for a URL parameter if the URL does not contain a segment for that parameter. 您指派物件屬性。You assign a object to the property. 在每個項目物件包含的參數，並使用此參數遺漏值的名稱。Each element in the object contains the name of a parameter and the value to use if the parameter is missing. 您可以包含中未定義參數的預設值為區段的屬性。You can include a default value for a parameter that is not defined in the property as a segment. 當 ASP.NET 路由處理要求時，此預設值是永遠會傳遞至路由處理常式。When ASP.NET routing handles a request, this default value is always passed to the route handler. 當您建構 URL，並將包含為區段未定義的預設參數的值時，路由將只會被視為相符如果您提供的值符合之路由的預設值。When you construct a URL and you include a value for a default parameter that is not defined as a segment, the route will only be considered a match if the value that you provided matches the default value for the route. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立物件，並設定， ，和屬性。The following example shows how to create a object and set the , , and properties. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Routing.Route.ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.Route.ctor/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Routing.Route.ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.Route.ctor/VB/Global.asax#1)] 下列範例所示物件，其屬性包含不屬於中的模式參數屬性。The following example shows a object whose property contains a parameter that is not part of the pattern in the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Routing.Route.Defaults#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.Route.Defaults/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Routing.Route.Defaults#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.Route.Defaults/vb/Global.asax#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定路由的 URL 模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL pattern for the route.

value.span: 比對路由與 URL 的模式。

span.span: The pattern for matching the route to a URL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您指派值給屬性，`/`剖析 URL 時，將會解譯為分隔符號的字元。When you assign a value to the property, the `/` character is interpreted as a delimiter when the URL is parsed. 使用大括號 (`{}`) 來定義的變數，指*URL 參數*。Use braces (`{}`) to define a variable that is referred to as a *URL parameter*. 在 URL 中相符的區段中的值指派給 URL 參數。The value from the matching segment in the URL is assigned to the URL parameter. 中的任何值不括在大括弧的屬性會被視為常值的常數。Any values in the property that are not enclosed in braces are treated as literal constants. `?`中不允許的字元屬性。The `?` character is not allowed in the property. 必須以分隔符號或常值常數分隔每一個 URL 區段。Each URL segment must be separated by either a delimiter or literal constant. 您可以使用`{{`或`}}`做為逸出大括號字元的字元。You can use `{{` or `}}` as escape characters for a brace character. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定類別建構函式中的屬性。The following example shows how to set the property in the class constructor. 模式包含的第一個區段和下面兩個區段的 URL 參數的常值 「 類別目錄 」。The pattern contains the literal value "Category" for the first segment and URL parameters for the next two segments. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes/vb/Global.asax#1)]

Docs.exception:
下列任何一項：
Any of the following:
- 值以 ~ 或 / 開頭。The value starts with ~ or /.
- 值包含 ?The value contains a ?字元取代的三併詞序列。character.
- catch-all 參數不是最後一個參數。The catch-all parameter is not last.

exception.span: 沒有以分隔符號或常值常數分隔 URL 區段。

span.span: URL segments are not separated by a delimiter or a literal constant.
